row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &GEN_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'Ablaufmgt_Fondsswitch_Gener' :SET &VERARB_ART# = 'F' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#_RL&ABLAUFMGT#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&GEN_BESCHREIBUNG#_RL&ABLAUFMGT#.log' ! --------------------------------------------- :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY1 = "Verarb: &ABLAUFMGT#" ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# VALUTA = &VALUTA# MANDANT = &MANDANTEN# VTRNR_VON = &AB_VTR_NR# VTRNR_BIS = &BIS_VTR_NR# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# BESCHREIBUNG = &GEN_BESCHREIBUNG# VERARB_ART = &VERARB_ART# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS# RL&ABLAUFMGT#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_RL&ABLAUFMGT#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY2 ="Restlaufzeit - &ABLAUFMGT#J)" ! ---------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
